article.title: Alaska U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Alaska U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​​​

Alaska U.S. Export Assistance Center

431 West 7th Ave., Suite 108
Anchorage, AK 99501-0700
http://www.buyusa.gov/alaska/​
Phone: 907-271-6237
Fax: 907-278-2982
Email: greg@wtcak.org

Anchorage Staff

Greg Wolf, Consultant
Phone: 907-278-7233
Fax: 907-278-2982
Email: Greg.Wolf@trade.gov

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30 am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​

​​
article.seometadatatitle: Alaska U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.seometadatadescription: Contact the Alaska U.S. Export Assistance Center.
